snippet: Fabio Aru surged to a win in the Vuelta a España’s hilly 18th stage, and Alberto Contador kept the leader’s red jersey.
abstract: Italian cyclist Fabio Aru wins hilly 18th stage of the Vuelta a Espana, and Spain's Alberto Contador keeps leader’s jersey.
lead_paragraph: Fabio Aru surged to a win in the Vuelta a España’s hilly 18th stage, and Alberto Contador kept the leader’s red jersey.

headline.main: Froome Narrows Contador’s Lead in Vuelta a España
headline.print_headline: Froome Narrows Contador’s Lead in Vuelta
